      • setOrientation

        public void setOrientation​(double orientation)
        Set the orientation of the turtle.
        Parameters:
        orientation - the orientation to be set, should between -pi to pi.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if orientation is not between -pi and pi

      • offsetOrientation

        public void offsetOrientation​(double offOrientation)
        Set the orientation of the turtle.
        Parameters:
        offOrientation - offset If the orientation is not between -pi and pi after offsetting, it will be shifted to between -pi and pi.
